title: Intel to List Shares in Mobileye Unit
sub_head: Move could value Mobileye at more than $50 billion, according to people familiar with the matter
body:
Intel Corp. is planning to publicly list shares in its Mobileye self-driving-car unit, the latest move by Chief Executive Pat Gelsinger to revive the semiconductor giantâ€™s fortunes.
Intel said it would take the unit public in the U.S. in mid-2022 through an initial public offering of new Mobileye stock. The move, earlier reported by The Wall Street Journal, could value Mobileye at north of $50 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.
